name: QuarkXPress Project Template
summary: Learn about .QPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QPT files are often used for creating templates for brochures, newsletters, flyers, and other publications.

description: Template file created by QuarkXPress, a program used to create professional page layouts; stores text, images, and page formatting information; enables users to create multiple .QXP files that have the same look and feel and layout properties.
